name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-teams-tag-csharp
title: This is a sample application that shows the usage of Graph CRUD operations related to team tags.
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to perform CRUD operations on team tags using Microsoft Graph API within a Microsoft Teams tab.
longDescription: This sample application allows users to create, update, and manage team tags using Microsoft Graph API in a Teams tab. It supports features like tag creation, editing, and deletion, enabling seamless interaction within team channels.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing gif animation for teams Tag CRUD operations.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
